3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Beckoning you with its treed garden courtyard and classic architecture, this Curtis Park dream home draws you in. Natural light fills the space in either direction: the inviting, spacious living room with abundant windows or toward the warm and ample dining room with views of the front courtyard garden. Dramatic high, coved ceilings, archway entries & extensive newly refinished original hardwood floors throughout. Impressive central post & bannister ascending from the entry hall to the 2nd story are a reminder of the home's heritage. Classic light & open kitchen with oversized windows & French door to expansive, inviting backyard. Downstairs has private office/den, powder room & entrance to the cellar with wine racks & storage. Upstairs balcony suspended in the trees with garden & park views. Three spacious bedrooms & two baths w/timeless period decor. Large primary suite with balcony. From the historic roof tile to the old growth redwood framing & original lath & plaster walls, this home is a piece of history. Enjoy the park in your front yard & the car free lifestyle. Walk to Schools, Grocery Stores, Restaurants, Breweries, Ice Cream Gunther's, Light Rail, Golf Course & more.
Confidential Remarks: Call/Text Erik Hoberg to set appointment (916) 425-0453. Escrow open with Fidelity National Title Co.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Come and live on one of the best streets in Sacramento! This exceptional home has been thoughtfully modernized with sumptuous yet understated high-quality finishes, with attention to detail, creating a truly unique and stylish experience. Offering a retro vibe, the art deco-inspired wood finishes features a Viking gas range and modern tilework. The home boasts four bedrooms and four full bathrooms. You'll also find a finished, over 400 square foot theater room/basement with a full bathroom and laundry. Newly installed items include kitchen countertops, a sink and backsplash, heated floors at the banquet and designer fixtures. The backyard offers an outdoor grilling kitchen and seating, turf grass, garden beds, relaxing water and fire pit features, creating the ideal indoor/outdoor livable space for hosting or enjoying a quite evening in Land Park. Homes on this street rarely hit the market. This is your chance to become part of this established community in the heart of Land Park!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Cream of the Crop Craftsman in Curtis Park! Only blocks from the Park, this high water bungalow has been lovingly expanded, remodeled and cared for by these owners since 1996. Step on to the fabulous front porch and then enter the world of hardwood floors, tall ceilings and abundant storage throughout. A Rumsford original fireplace adorns the living room and the kitchen has been respectfully transformed for modern living with shaker style cabinets, quartz countertops, SS appliances and a hammered copper sink. In 2010, an elegant primary suite was added seamlessly on top with an amazing spa-like bathroom complete with luxurious soaking tub, double sinks and multi stream shower with skylight. The primary bedroom offers peace and tranquility up among the trees with lovely transom windows providing light and flowing breezes with built-in bookcases for coziness. Custom stained glass windows and door panels artfully placed throughout the home provide a nexus of beauty and function. Beauty and function continue into the generous front and back yards with an Ipe deck, brick patios, Pergola, built in barbeque and handsome metal fence with a rust patina all mindfully woven together with lush vegetation providing both splendor and bounty. This is a home you must see and appreciate!
Confidential Remarks: Thank you for showing! Easy to show but please call or text Steffan at 916-717-7217 to make an appointment as they have two dogs they need to take for a walk. Escrow is opened with Nikki Davis at Stewart Title.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Spectacular Spanish Charmer only a block from Curtis Park! Come fall in love with this 3 bedroom, 2 bath beauty with arched doorways, lead mullioned picture window, inlaid hdwd floors, open beam ceilings and restored original windows. Lovingly maintained and artfully renovated/upgraded adding a full bath and perfecting the kitchen (2022) with artisan birch cabinets, premium appliances, Genoa soapstone countertops and a nod to the past with the refurbished O'Keefe and Merritt stove. All systems are good to go with new HVAC (2022), tankless water heater, updated panel and electrical, all new copper piping and a 50 yr stone coated metal roof (2005). Live your summer dreams in the huge backyard with a stunning 33 ft sparkling pool with retractable cover and relax on the patios under the Pergola while you bbq and enjoy your friends. Verdant grass and lush vegetation throughout the front and back yards with fruit trees to add to your bounty. This home is top shelf and has it all! Come live your Curtis Park dream!
Confidential Remarks: Thank you for showing! Offers, if any, will be due Tuesday 8/20/24. Escrow opened with Nikki Davis at Stewart Title.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome home to a charming cottage in the heart of Sacramento's North City Farms neighborhood. This beautiful cottage offers a blend of modern comforts and vintage charm. Home features a spacious living room, two bedrooms plus a bonus room. There is also an office room that makes working from home possible. Step outside to the large private backyard and enjoy al fresco dining or morning coffee. The expansive yard provides plenty of space for gardening, playing, or simply unwinding in the California sunshine. Grow your seasonal veggies in the large planter boxes and still have plenty of yard space to add fruit trees and more! Backyard shed allows for storage or even a detached office space or ADU. With its prime location walking distance to Curtis Park & Crocker Village you'll enjoy easy access to the best that Sacramento has to offer, including nearby restaurants, shops, and cultural attractions. Plus, with close proximity to downtown and major freeways, commuting is a breeze. Don't miss your chance to own this enchanting cottage in one of Sacramento's most coveted neighborhoods. Schedule a showing today and experience the charm and character for yourself!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to this high water bungalow in the heart of Curtis Park. Sip your coffee on the inviting porch swing and greet the passers-by as they walk this friendly close-in neighborhood. The home features three bedrooms, one bath, on a generously sized lot which has been professionally landscaped for your outdoor enjoyment. Inside, you'll find beautiful moldings and woodwork and a large picture window in the living room. The dining room showcases a built-in buffet hutch with leaded glass windows above, a testament to the craftsmanship of a bygone era. Step into the kitchen and discover a bright, roomy space with access to the deck, offering views of the lush backyard complete with plum and orange trees. This home has had significant updates including a new heating and air conditioning unit installed in 2023, a composition shingle roof replaced in 2021, newer appliances added in 2023 & 2017, and an updated electrical panel in 2017. With the major renovations already done, you can simply move in and enjoy!

With the opening of Ray Earnes park around the corner coming soon, come enjoy contemporary living and all the surrounding area has to offer!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to this charming Curtis Park Tudor with detached 2-bedroom, 1 bathroom unit, 885 square feet. Built in 1928, this desirable home boasts 1,435 square feet, blending vintage charm with modern updates. The primary living room features built-in bookshelves and brick fireplace with woodburning insert. The dining room features built-in hutch with original chandelier. The kitchen was updated in mid-2000's, it now features new cabinets, Corian counter tops and appliances. The addition of a new dishwasher and a gas free-standing range ensures convenience and functionality. Additional improvement includes dual pane windows throughout and central heat & air. For those who appreciate a touch of nostalgia, most of the lighting and hardware are original. The detached rental/guest unit features built-in cabinets in dining nook, spacious living space with living room, dining nook, kitchen and laundry room. Both units have new interior paint, the rental unit has new carpet as well. Don't miss this opportunity to live in one of the most sought out neighborhoods in Sacramento and have an income property as well. Come make this house your home.
Confidential Remarks: Please text agent before showing. Pest Work completed, reinspection which is scheduled for Tuesday. Trust Sale, As is. Please submit pre-approval with offer. Escrow is open at Old Republic Fair Oaks.
Directions to Property: 12th to 24th Street to address.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Tudor Cottage in the heart of Curtis Park! Nestled amongst remarkable homes on a great street only a couple of blocks from the park, this spacious 3 bedroom, 1 bath home has been owned by the same family for over 50 years and is waiting for you to bring a little love and put your touches on it! Spacious and open floor plan with great flow, original hardwood floors and built-ins throughout. Charming fireplace, coved ceilings in the living room and a super cute breakfast nook! Brand new roof and gutters, updated panel and water heater and a renovated bath with a walk-in shower. Large deep lot with plenty of room for entertaining, room for a pool and/or expanding the living space, and a huge deep garage with alley access and newer roof. Come enjoy all that Curtis Park has to offer... community, parks, restaurants, shopping and more! Come home!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome home to modern elegance in the heart of Sacramento and Crocker Village! Situated on a premium lot, this captivating 3-bedroom, 2-bath sanctuary bathes in natural light, creating an inviting atmosphere that effortlessly blends indoor and outdoor living. The beautifully landscaped backyard offers a pergola over a paver patio for summer dinners & large turf area to play. The sunken fire pit area sets the stage for peaceful moments of relaxation. Back inside through the stacking glass slider, luxury vinyl plank flooring covers every corner of the house. The spacious kitchen has a Herringbone backsplash, large island with a sink & bar seating, plenty of storage space, a closet pantry, & Quartz countertops. The master bedroom is bright & spacious with a walk in closet & built in shelving for organization, & a sliding barn door to the bathroom. Both bathrooms have a double sink Quartz vanity & subway tile in the shower. The spacious laundry room has plenty of cabinet space & a sink for all your laundry needs. Epoxied garage floor and owned solar. Come enjoy contemporary living and all the surrounding area has to offer!
Confidential Remarks: Please contact Emily for showings and give 1hr notice for showings. DO NOT USE SHOWING TIME. Front landscaping maintained by HOA. Please reach out to Tyler with any questions about the property. Seller disclosures are available. Approximately $100k put into the backyard landscaping.
Directions to Property: From 12th Ave turn Right. Turn Right onto Crocker

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Welcome to your next home in the highly desired CURTIS PARK neighborhood! With 4-bedrooms, 2 FULL bathrooms and over 1,500 sq ft of spacious living. The upgraded kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring brand new quartz countertops, sleek stainless-steel dishwasher and stove, and a Whirlpool over-the-range microwave. Elegant vinyl wood plank flooring flows throughout, natural light floods the home creating a warm and inviting atmosphere and stay cool in the summer with ceiling fans in every room! Step outside into your own backyard paradise - a fabulous retreat or entertainers dream with a gazebo complete with electricity for your stringed lights or an outdoor TV! The spacious backyard also boasts a large grassy area perfect for activities (and maybe a pool or ADU?) along with a beautiful Oak Tree. Perfectly situated down the street from Curtis Park, several breweries, and the iconic Gunther's Ice Cream, this home offers both convenience and entertainment. Commuting is a breeze, as the freeway is just minutes away. Are you ready to be the next loving owner of 3042 8th Avenue?

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: From the charming front porch to the jaw dropping salt water pool and spa, this Crocker Village stunner is spellbinding. Flooring on-the-diagonal draws you in to the grand entry hall with home office space and powder room. Just beyond the grand staircase you will find the artful temperature-controlled wine room tucked behind custom dual paned wine cellar glass doors and innovative fingerprint security. Next, you'll find the gourmet kitchen with up market appliances, cabinetry, fixtures, and hardware. The entire back side of the home flows out to the grand prize worthy backyard oasis. Accordion doors from the living room open to the resort like patio, decking, seating and dining areas. You will find three fire pits, including the huge 19-foot wall of flame between the pool and the dining area. The outdoor kitchen features Blaze brand appliances including ice maker, refrigerator, storage cabinetry, sink, BBQ, and wood fired pizza oven. The spa with infinity edge and pool are of a split finish pebble tech design. Your relaxation options are guaranteed within this serene and welcoming outdoor space.
